title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities               Outdoor Activities      Take a self-guided walking tour of the Royal Grounds and Puuhonua and take a walk back in time. Avid hikers may opt to head for the park back-country trails to view historic agricultural sites that give clues into the way Hawaiians once lived and prospered here. Fishing and picnicking can be enjoyed at the picnic area.
